ModMetaData.name: Make War Not Love (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Blas88
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Blas88s mod for RimWorld 1.1 Based on an update made by TomaszA2 https://www.reddit.com/r/RimWorld/comments/9zzcjo/does_make_war_not_love_work_for_10/ Published by Chocopie https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1984083304
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/MakeWarNotLove
- Replaced all defs with patches
--- Original Description --- This mod gives a great benefit in performance at mid-late game by disable the social relationship of our colonist.
